rooms.description: North-facing entrance leading to the living areas. Vastu principles prioritized by having a clear and inviting entrance.
Spacious modern living room with natural light enhancing aesthetics. Open to dining area.
Adjacent to the kitchen and living room, promoting family interactions.
Modern, well-ventilated kitchen with ample counter space. Designed for joint family cooking requirements.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached bathroom and walk-in closet, ensuring privacy and comfort.
Cozy yet comfortable guest room designed to accommodate family guests or extended family members.
Dedicated workspace with proper lighting and ventilation, suitable for remote work scenarios.
Dedicated living and bedroom space for servants, with basic amenities.
Small room adjacent to servant's quarters for storage and washing area.
